sources.title: Abe & Bruno - Full Movie
sources.description:
Click here to watch great FREE Movies & TV: http://filmrise.com


Best friends and roommates, Abe and Bruno share just about everything. Their quiet life together is suddenly interrupted the day Abe collapses from a heart attack. When Bruno runs for help, pandemonium overtakes their little town at the sight of him - a 500-pound silverback gorilla. Although Abe's life is saved, zoo fugitive Bruno is now on the loose! The race to protect Bruno from the law is on in this exciting, heartwarming comedy about loyalty, sacrifice and true friendship.

#freemovies #moviesondemand #fullmovie
